questions.question: Imagine your life in 10 years time. What will it look like?

answers.answer: In ten years, I will be a successfull lawyer en Belgium. I will marry a man who will love me for who I am. I will have beautiful childrens and a dog named Jackson. I will be living in the countryside in a big house with a pool. I will do a lot of sport after work, like running, playing tennis and gym. In ten years, the most important thing that I would like to be is happy.
